name: A set of tattooed trollskin armbands
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer of the trollskin bracers can 'regenerate'.
